title: Science Leadership Enhancement Program Through Online Collaborative Learning Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge in scientific fields and management/leadership experience
context.additional_context: Long-term corporate training course for science field managers conducted in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can complete online collaborative tasks incorporating gamification elements with over 80% completeness
Learners can proactively lead three or more open communication sessions with peers in team-based science problem-solving projects
Learners can achieve satisfaction scores of 4.0/5.0 or higher in team cohesion surveys through gamified collaborative activities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
